translation.en: [father] Let's try to get that in there.
You gonna catch the ball?
-Yeah. -All right.
No, Aiden, I'm not a rookie. I've played football since I was four.

translation.en: I've played football since I was two or three.
translation.it: - Gioco a football dai miei quattro anni. - E io da che ne avevo due o tre.

translation.en: [boy] Say it! One, two, three… easies!
[coach 1] Welcome to football, fellas!
[coach 2] Get over there, man.
[player] Team, down!

translation.en: One!
Go!
[coach 3] You know, the Saints…
Let's go, 9U! Let's show how we work!
[coach 3] …it means, "God's people."
Suck it up. This is football. This is what makes you tough.
translation.it: Sopporta. Il football è così. Questo ti rende forte.

translation.en: All right? Come on.
[coach 3] It's all of us.
[man] You run an angle. Angle hook. Go right.
translation.it: Devi mirare a qualcosa, a destra.

translation.en: [player] Ready… Go!
[coach 4] A successful program isn't determined
translation.it: Un programma di successo non dipende da quanti campionati nazionali hai.

translation.en: by how many national championships you have. Yes, that's a good thing,
translation.it: Un programma di successo non dipende da quanti campionati nazionali hai. Sì, è una buona cosa,

translation.en: but our goal is to make sure that every season, we save a life.
translation.it: ma il nostro obiettivo è di salvare una vita a stagione.

translation.en: [mother] The Saints have saved my kid.
translation.it: I Saints hanno salvato mio figlio.

translation.en: Because my son did have a lot of self-esteem issues.
translation.it: Perché mio figlio aveva molti problemi di autostima.

translation.en: And he didn't know what he wanted to do
translation.it: E non sapeva cosa volesse fare,

translation.en: until he met the Saints.
translation.it: finché non ha incontrato i Saints.

translation.en: [coach 3] I'm not even talking about the NFL.
As long as you can get to college and get a free education, I've done my job.
translation.it: Se puoi andare all'università gratis, ho fatto il mio lavoro.

translation.en: [coach 1] People hear about Brooklyn, you know, and East New York.
translation.it: La gente sente parlare di Brooklyn, a East New York.

translation.en: They think, "Negativity,"
just 'cause the simple fact of the way the news portrays…
translation.it: semplicemente per il modo in cui ne parlano i media…

translation.en: You know, 'cause everybody thinks Brooklyn is about the gangs,
translation.it: semplicemente per il modo in cui ne parlano i media… Tutti pensano che Brooklyn sia solo gang,

translation.en: and shooting and killing, the ghetto.
And it's really not like that.
I'm the king of this ship.
translation.it: Sono il re di questa nave.

translation.en: [coach 1] If you really look into Brooklyn and into the souls of the people…
translation.it: Se guardi davvero Brooklyn e dentro l'anima della gente…

translation.en: -[boy] What's up, Mr. Jimmy? -Hey, boy. What up?
translation.it: Come sta, sig. Jimmy? - Ehi, ragazzo. Che fai? - Niente.

translation.en: Nothing.
…you'll see another side of Brooklyn.
[man] That's a flower. See? That's the tree.
translation.it: È un fiore. Vedi? Quello è l'albero.

translation.en: [coach 1] You'll never hear that across the news.
translation.it: Non lo sentirai mai al telegiornale.

translation.en: 'Cause that's not the things they look for.
translation.it: Perché non è quello che cercano.

translation.en: [coach 1] We teach the kids fundamentals of football. We teach them how to be young men.
translation.it: Insegniamo ai bambini le basi del football, a diventare uomini.

translation.en: Easy. Easy.
[coach 1] We teach the kids to be proud of who you are
translation.it: Insegniamo ai bambini a essere orgogliosi di sé stessi, delle loro origini.

translation.en: and be proud of where you come from.
translation.it: a essere orgogliosi di sé stessi, delle loro origini.

translation.en: [coach 1] We're not perfect.
It's not easy.
They say it takes a village to raise a child.
translation.it: Ci vuole un villaggio per crescere un bambino, dicono.

translation.en: [coach 1] But the Brooklyn Saints is that village.
translation.it: I Brooklyn Saints sono quel villaggio.

translation.en: This is the Brooklyn people rarely see.
translation.it: È la Brooklyn che la gente vede di rado.

translation.en: [coach 1] That's the truth.
It's the Brooklyn Saints.
Easy! Let's win this! Good job, Saints!
[coach 1] We are the show.
-Who the show? -[players] We the show!
translation.it: - Chi è lo spettacolo? - Siamo noi!

translation.en: -Am I my brother's keeper? -[players] You already know!
translation.it: Chi mi guarda le spalle? Le finestre!

translation.en: -Saints on the field! -[players] You know!
-Where we from? -[players] Brooklyn!
-Where we from? -[players] Brooklyn!
Brooklyn!
[all] We are the Saints! We are the Saints!
translation.it: - Brooklyn! - Noi siamo i Saints! Noi siamo i Saints!

-Huh? -I said, "What grade you in now?"
-Oh, fifth. -[barber] All right.

Uh, no, we lost.

Thirty-two-zip.

-Yeah. -[barber exclaims]

translation.it: Gioco con i Saints da tre anni.

translation.en: I'm a quarterback.
I love football because since I was young, that was…
translation.it: Amo il football perché… sin da quando ero piccolo,

translation.en: That was the only thing I wanted to do when I was young.
translation.it: era l'unica cosa che volevo fare.

translation.en: I used to come to the football field when I was two or three, with my dad.
translation.it: A due o tre anni venivo sul campo di football con mio padre.

translation.en: Try to help out, try to play.
Try to practice with him.
[barber] You know what's-his-name grew up around the corner.
You know who Curtis Samuel is?
He's on the Carolina Panthers now.
Yeah, he grew up around the corner.
I used to cut his hair.
You got to make it to that status.
[D-Lo] I want to play football for the rest of my life because that's the only thing I want to do.
translation.it: Voglio giocare per il resto della vita, non voglio fare altro.

-That's right! Let's go! -[coach 1] Yeah, D-Lo!
-[D-Lo] I'm running it left. -[player] This side? Why?

[father] On his right.
Ready?
Go!

[coach 3] There it is. That's what I'm talking about.
translation.it: Così si fa. Ecco di cosa parlo.

translation.it: È il lancio che volevo. Serio D-Lo.

translation.en: -[coach 2] All-day D-Lo? -[coach 1] One of those rare players.
[coach 2] Right? For real. D-Lo all day.
Huddle. Huddle…

translation.it: Quando mi dicono che ho la squadra sulle spalle

translation.en: I can bring them to a "W." I can bring them to a win.

be respectful, have fun,
and don't think about the past.
-[boy 1] How much games do we have? -[boy 2] I think… about five or ten.

translation.it: No, intendo per tutta la stagione.

So, like, our season, we might go 6-4.
translation.it: Quindi, nella stagione, potremmo fare sei e quattro.

-Imagine that he jinxes it. -[boy] That's awesome.

Watch, you could jinx it, bro. Watch, you gonna jinx it.

-Yeah. -…for the national championship?
And then we lost.
[Mykel] When we make it to Florida, I want revenge.

Want this one? This is light.

Don't push it. Wrap it. -Okay. -All right?

translation.en: -[groans] -There we go.
[boy] To be a Saint, you have to love everybody.
translation.it: Per essere un Saint , devi amare tutti.

translation.en: If somebody's down, you've got to pick them up. On all courses.
translation.it: Se qualcuno cade, devi rialzarlo. Sempre.

translation.en: It's all love in the Brooklyn Saints.
translation.it: È tutto amore nei Brooklyn Saints.

translation.en: Like, when we on the field, we're connected.
translation.it: Quando siamo sul campo, siamo in sintonia.

translation.en: Instead of just being a sport, it's like a family.
translation.it: Non è solo uno sport, è una famiglia.

translation.en: You can just come together and just talk.
We always go to each other's birthday parties,
translation.it: Andiamo alle feste di compleanno di tutti noi

translation.en: and we also go to their house.
translation.it: e ci andiamo a trovare a casa.

translation.en: Like, um, we even go if it's in Long Island.
translation.it: E andiamo anche se è a Long Island.

translation.en: Everybody on this team is my family.
9U, say, "Welcome, Man Man, to the Brooklyn Saints family."
translation.it: Ok, 9-U, dite: "Benvenuto, Man Man, nella famiglia dei Brooklyn Saints".

translation.en: [all] Welcome, Man Man, to the Brooklyn Saints family.
translation.it: Benvenuto, Man Man, nella famiglia dei Brooklyn Saints.

[all] Easy!
-Y'all ready to work today? -Yes, coach.
translation.it: - Pronti a lavorare, vero? - Sì, coach.

translation.en: All right, let me tighten you up so we can get working, get ready.
translation.it: Vi stringo, così possiamo iniziare a lavorare.

translation.en: [player] Dang, you got big muscles.
But, got a small head.
9U, if you got a mouthpiece, put it in your mouth so you're not talking.
translation.it: Squadra, se avete un paradenti mettetelo così non parlate.

translation.en: [all] Yes, coach. Yes, coach.
Let's get him! Let's get him! He ain't going nowhere. Let's get him!
translation.it: Prendiamolo! Non va da nessuna parte. Prendiamolo! Bella! Diamoci dentro.

translation.en: Easy! We want all that smoke this year. Let's get him!
translation.it: Non va da nessuna parte. Prendiamolo! Bella! Diamoci dentro. Prendiamolo!

translation.en: The Saints organization started over ten years ago.
translation.it: L'organizzazione dei Saints è iniziata oltre dieci anni fa.

translation.en: I believe in mid-2009.
My staff consists of my vice president, Dave,
translation.it: Il mio staff è composto dal mio vicepresidente, Dave,

translation.en: our founder, Puma, and Shon.
translation.it: il nostro fondatore, Puma, e Shon,

translation.en: Nice!
And my wife, Khadeja, which is pretty much our administration.
translation.it: e mia moglie, Khadejah, che è la nostra amministratrice.

translation.en: -[groans] -[Shon] Get up, get up, get up!
We used to have what they call, "PAL." "Police Athletic Leagues."
translation.it: Avevamo quello che chiamano "PAL". "Campionati Atletici Polizia".

translation.en: No more.
They used to leave the schools open for activities.
translation.it: Lasciavano le scuole aperte per le attività.

translation.en: All of those programs are cut.
This is where we step in.
[Puma] We just try to put you in position where you can better yourself in life.
translation.it: Cerchiamo di metterli in grado di migliorare la loro vita.

translation.en: It don't have to be with sports.
Doctor, a lawyer, it could be any one of those things.
translation.it: Dottore, avvocato, potrebbe essere qualsiasi cosa.

translation.en: As long as we get you a free education,
we did our job.
Let's get three. Easy. Easy.
[Dave] With our program, it all starts with Coach Gawuala.
translation.it: Tutto ha inizio con il coach Gawuala.

translation.en: -What's up, young man? How you feeling? -Good.
translation.it: - Come va, ragazzo? Come stai? - Bene.

translation.en: Welcome to the Saints. Thanks for coming out.
translation.it: Benvenuto nei Saints. Grazie di essere qui.

translation.en: -Saints, how y'all feel? -[all] You know!
translation.it: - Saints, come vi sentite? - Lo sai!

translation.en: That is the heart and soul of our organization.
translation.it: È il cuore e l'anima della nostra organizzazione.

translation.en: Everybody, show some love.
It's the Brooklyn way.
Easy. Let's get it.
Happy feet.
-[man] What's going on, bro? -Let's go, boy. I'm here.
translation.it: - Com'è, fratello? - Tutto bene. Sono qui.

translation.en: [Gawuala] I started that back in 2009 when we started the organization.
translation.it: Ho iniziato nel 2009, quando abbiamo fondato l'organizzazione.

translation.en: I felt like I had to salute each kid that came out
translation.it: Sentivo di dover rendere omaggio a ogni ragazzo

translation.en: to participate into playing football.
translation.it: che veniva a far parte del football.

translation.en: 'Cause it's not easy and it's a lot. It's a lot to go through,
translation.it: Perché non è facile ed è tanta roba. È tanta roba da affrontare, quindi rendo loro omaggio perché sono qui.

translation.en: so that's just me saluting the kids for coming out. I salute them.
translation.it: È tanta roba da affrontare, quindi rendo loro omaggio perché sono qui. Li saluto.

translation.en: Three claps and a salute.
Salute you, salute the Saints, salute your parents.
translation.it: Per loro, per i Saints, per i genitori.

translation.en: Just salute to the people that make it happen.
translation.it: Per coloro che lo rendono possibile.

translation.en: D-Lo, it's your year this year, baby boy. You already know.
translation.it: D-Lo. È il tuo anno, ragazzino. Lo sai già.

translation.en: [Demel] He brings out the eagerness and the drive and determination in them kids.
translation.it: È lui che fa emergere la forza e la determinazione di quei ragazzi.

translation.en: He makes them believe that they can do anything,
translation.it: Fa credere loro di poter fare qualunque cosa

translation.en: they can be anybody at any given time.
If Gawuala told some kids that they could fly,
translation.it: Se dicesse loro che possono volare,

translation.en: they'd go home and say, "Mommy, Daddy, I can fly because Gawuala said I could fly."
translation.it: direbbero: "Mamma, papà, posso volare, lo ha detto Gawuala".

translation.en: When I say "three," you give me an "Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh!"
translation.it: Al mio tre, dite: "Ooh, ooh, ooh, ooh".

translation.en: One! Two! Three!
If Coach Gawuala can do it, you can do it. Call it.
translation.it: Se il coach Gawuala lo può fare, potete anche voi. Su.

translation.en: Go! Ready… go!
[coach] I mean, everybody need to do good in school, always.
translation.it: Tutti devono andare bene a scuola, sempre.

translation.en: School is first. Responsibility at home.
translation.it: Prima viene la scuola. I doveri a casa.

translation.en: And then football.
You understand me?
[all] Yes, coach.
[Demel] So, we have three levels.
We have the 9U, which is seven to the age of nine.
We have an 11U, which has kids from ten to 11-year-olds.
translation.it: Abbiamo l'11U, con bambini dai 10 agli 11 anni.

translation.en: And we have a 13U, which has kids from 12 to 13.
translation.it: E abbiamo il 13U, con bambini dai 12 ai 13 anni.

translation.en: Set…
[coach] Watch him.
Go!
[coach] Do the turn. Uh-huh, good.
That's where it's supposed to be. Do it again!
Set… go!
[Dave] 13U? Boy, oh, boy.
No experience whatsoever.
I would say three kids, probably, had played football ever.
translation.it: Forse tre ragazzi hanno già giocato a football.

translation.en: And, because of that, Kenan became a leader.
translation.it: Per questo Kenan è diventato un leader.

translation.en: Down! Set… go!
[Kenan] I been playing football for almost like a decade now.
translation.it: Gioco a football da circa un decennio.

translation.en: Since I was four years old.
My brothers, they used to play football.
translation.it: I miei fratelli giocavano a football.

translation.en: So, actually, I caught love with it while watching them playing football.
translation.it: Quindi, in realtà, me ne sono innamorato guardandoli giocare.

translation.en: [Gawuala] We got a couple of new guys over here, so…
translation.it: Abbiamo due ragazzi nuovi qui, quindi…

translation.en: [Kenan] We didn't have a quarterback, so I decided to step up and take that role
translation.it: Non avevamo un quarterback, così ho deciso di coprire quel ruolo

translation.en: and be the leader.
Squeeze the ball tight, over…
translation.it: Stringi forte la palla, poi dall'alto… scagliala. Ok?

translation.en: Dart it. All right?
[Kenan] This is my last youth season.
translation.it: Questa è la mia ultima stagione giovanile.

translation.en: I just want to bring it out with a good year.
Set… go!
[coach in distance] Caught the ball, right? Good!
[Demel] Having my son play on the team, of course, you'll look at it
translation.it: Avere mio figlio in squadra, certo, penserete: "Ok, quello è suo padre, avrà un trattamento speciale",

translation.en: like, "Okay, that's his father, he's gonna get special treatment."
translation.it: certo, penserete: "Ok, quello è suo padre, avrà un trattamento speciale",

translation.en: But, on the flip side, we're really, really hard on him.
translation.it: ma, al contrario, siamo molto duri con lui.

translation.en: We expect more from him than we expect from anyone else.
translation.it: Esigiamo da lui più che da chiunque altro.

translation.en: We got to keep you working out.
This is gonna be a big year for you this year, so we've got to have you ready.
translation.it: Sarà un anno importante per te, quindi dobbiamo prepararti.

translation.en: [Demel] Stop going away from it. Stop fading away. Go into the ball.
translation.it: Smettila di scappare. Vai sulla palla.

translation.en: Better.
Look how far your brother's knee is bent.
translation.it: Guarda il ginocchio di tuo fratello.

translation.en: Get it bent, then you put this foot back to where it's comfortable.
translation.it: Piegalo e metti il piede indietro, dove ti senti comodo.

translation.en: [Demel] Set… go!
-Watch your hands right here. Go ahead. -[coach] Put your hands up.
translation.it: Guardati le mani. Vai. Mani in alto.

translation.en: Your hands up, up, up! Like you ready to fight.
translation.it: Mani in alto! Come per combattere.

translation.en: Like you ready to fight. This is a fight.
translation.it: Come per combattere. È una lotta. Quando siamo così vicini,

translation.en: When we this close to each other, we fighting.
translation.it: È una lotta. Quando siamo così vicini, lottiamo.

translation.en: -You got it? -[Kenan] Uh-huh.
Look, you got all your brothers here. You see how much knowledge you getting?
translation.it: Qui ci sono tutti i tuoi fratelli. Vedi quanto stai imparando?

translation.en: All right, you're the last of our legacy. You know we all got you.
translation.it: Sei l'ultimo della nostra famiglia, ti sosteniamo.

translation.en: Everybody putting everything that we… All our knowledge, all our speed, power, energy, into you.
translation.it: Ognuno di noi ti dà tutto: il sapere, la velocità, la forza, l'energia.

translation.en: So just take it all in and perform.
translation.it: Quindi prendi tutto e fai il tuo dovere.

translation.en: -You got it? -Uh-huh.
All right?
[coach] Even if he is here, boom. Might get somebody, too close.
translation.it: Anche se è qui, bum. Potrebbe avvicinarsi troppo.

translation.en: [Kenan] Football is like…
I wanna take that as far as I could.
translation.it: Voglio arrivare il più lontano possibile.

translation.en: If I can't go to the pros, I'll use it to my ability to go to college,
translation.it: Se non potrò essere un professionista, lo userò per andare al college,

translation.en: get a good education, learn something.
translation.it: ottenere una buona istruzione, imparare qualcosa.

translation.en: [teacher 1] I said get your robots, get your laptops,
translation.it: Ripeto, prendete i robot, i laptop,

translation.en: let's bring our programs up and let's get to it.
translation.it: tirate fuori i programmi e diamoci dentro.

translation.en: [teacher 1] Where we at, Kenan?
That's so odd.
[teacher 1] I mean, I am leaning on the table. Try it again.
translation.it: Io sono appoggiato al tavolo. Riprovaci.

translation.en: As young, he would piece puzzles together. And not like regular, uh…
translation.it: A casa, assemblava i puzzle. Non quelli normali…

translation.en: Big puzzles. Like 100-piece puzzles, he's like four or five years old.
translation.it: Puzzle grandi, da cento pezzi, a quattro o cinque anni.

translation.en: He didn't even look at the picture. He'd just take the shapes
translation.it: Non guardava il disegno. Prendeva i pezzi

translation.en: and, because of the way the shapes are,
he knew which puzzle piece lined up. He wouldn't even look at the box.
translation.it: sapeva come assemblarli. Non guardava nemmeno la scatola.

translation.en: I knew from then that this kid is something different.
translation.it: Da allora ho capito che questo ragazzo è diverso.

translation.en: [teacher 1] It's stopping there every time. Why is it doing this?
translation.it: Si ferma lì ogni volta. Perché lo fa?

translation.en: [Kenan] I put it to 1.4.
[teacher 1] One-point-four? Well, then, keep adding.
translation.it: Uno e quattro? Allora continua ad aggiungere.

translation.en: It feel like it's first-and-ten and we on a goal line
translation.it: Sembra di essere al primo e dieci sulla linea di fondo

translation.en: when you watching him compete.
[teacher 2] Ah! Run again.
[Demel] So, when I see him really execute something,
translation.it: Quindi quando lo vedo eseguire qualcosa,

translation.en: it's like, "Wow."
It's almost the same feeling he has when he scores a touchdown.
translation.it: È quasi quello che prova quando segna un touchdown.

translation.en: [Kenan] That one worked out.
-[laughs] -[teacher 2] That works.
You all right? What's next?
[Kenan] When I started robotics, I seen this whole new world open up.
translation.it: Con la robotica, ho visto un nuovo mondo aprirsi.

translation.en: And it was just, like, "I wanna do this when I get older."
translation.it: E ho sentito di voler fare questo, da grande.

translation.en: [man 1] Gawuala, Gawuala!
What's good, Bubba? How you doing, good?
Everything cool?
Yeah, yeah..
-[man 2] What's up, brother? -You got kids? How old?
translation.it: - Come va? - Hai figli? Di quanti anni?

translation.en: Nine and 14.
-Yeah, that's perfect. -He'll like it.
Give me a pen. I'll give you my number.
translation.it: Dammi una penna. Ti do il mio numero.

translation.en: He's gonna love it.
-American football, not soccer. -[man] Yeah.
"Coach Eddie," all right? I'll bring you some information.
-Thank you. I appreciate it. -A flyer and some information.
translation.it: - Grazie mille. - Un volantino e delle informazioni.

translation.en: -Thank you. I appreciate you. -No problem.
translation.it: Sono io che ti ringrazio. Prego.

translation.en: All this… All this is my stomping grounds.
My mother was raising six kids in a two-bedroom apartment.
translation.it: Mia madre ha cresciuto sei figli in due camere da letto.

translation.en: Uh, she did wonderful work, what she did with us.
translation.it: Ha fatto un ottimo lavoro con noi.

translation.en: Never been to college. I don't know what college is.
translation.it: Non sono andato al college, non so cosa sia.

translation.en: I never graduated high school.
translation.it: Non mi sono mai diplomato al liceo.

translation.en: I never got a chance to walk across the stage and pick up a diploma.
translation.it: Non ho avuto la possibilità di salire sul palco e ricevere un diploma.

translation.en: None of that. I wasn't into that.
I was, um… young and lost in life. I was reckless.
translation.it: Ero giovane e perso nella vita. Ero incosciente.

translation.en: Um, I didn't think of graduating school and all, getting a GED, or none of that.
translation.it: Non pensavo a diplomarmi o prendere un titolo GED.

translation.en: We can't stay in the past. We got to learn from our mistakes 'cause if you don't learn from your mistakes,
translation.it: Non si può vivere nel passato. Bisogna imparare dai propri errori, altrimenti…

translation.en: you're just gonna be lost in the system and that's what the system wants.
translation.it: ci si perde nel sistema ed è quello che vuole il sistema.

translation.en: The system wants us to be lost and…
translation.it: Il sistema vuole che ci perdiamo

translation.en: So they can continue to conquer and keep us divided, and…
translation.it: per poter continuare a conquistare tenendoci divisi e…

translation.en: We greater than that.
[Gawuala] To be a coach is a lot.
translation.it: Fare il coach è tanta roba.

translation.en: 'Cause when you a coach, the world puts you on a pedestal that…
translation.it: Quando sei un allenatore, ti mettono su un piedistallo

translation.en: They look at you as a perfection person.
translation.it: e guardano a te come a una persona perfetta.

translation.en: And I'm far from…
I'm far from perfect. I'm far from a role model.
translation.it: Ma sono tutt'altro che perfetto. Non sono un esempio.

translation.en: I'm a human being. I make mistakes. I have mistakes. I do get stressed.
translation.it: Sono un essere umano. Faccio errori. Mi stresso.

translation.en: I have my own problems that I deal with in life and, um,
translation.it: Ho i miei problemi da affrontare nella vita.

translation.en: I try to keep it separate, but once in a while, it catches up to me.
translation.it: Cerco di tenerli separati, ma a volte mi prendono

translation.en: Especially, you start as the young age group like I do,
translation.it: e, specie se inizi con un gruppo dell'età che seguo io,

translation.en: you basically raise a lot of these kids,
translation.it: e, specie se inizi con un gruppo dell'età che seguo io, praticamente cresci molti bambini che diventano tuoi, pezzi del tuo cuore.

translation.en: so they definitely become yours, and a piece of your heart.
translation.it: praticamente cresci molti bambini che diventano tuoi, pezzi del tuo cuore.

translation.en: So when they hurt, you hurt.
Believe, when you down, they see it and they know.
translation.it: Credimi, quando sei giù, lo vedono, lo capiscono,

translation.en: So I just feed off the energy they give me and try to make a positive out of it.
translation.it: quindi mi nutro dell'energia che mi danno e cerco di trarne il meglio.

translation.en: 9U, if you ready to put work in today, give me a, "Haa!"
translation.it: Se siete pronti a lavorare, datemi un :"Ah!"

translation.en: Yeah, we about to work today. That's what I like to hear.
translation.it: Sì, oggi lavoreremo. Mi piace sentirlo.

translation.en: [Aiden] Coach Puma? Are you happy for hell week?
translation.it: Coach Puma, sei felice per la settimana infernale?

translation.en: -[Puma] Are you happy? -Yes, actually.
translation.it: - Tu lo sei? - Sì, a dire il vero.

translation.en: [coach 1] Hell week. We practice every day.
…time to get serious, now.
translation.it: È ora di fare sul serio.

translation.en: Almost game time. Two weeks, let's go!
translation.it: Manca poco al campionato. Due settimane, forza!

translation.en: Welcome to your worst nightmare.
[coach 1] Game faces on, let's go!
Go! Go, RJ! Push him, RJ! Let's go!
translation.it: Vai! Vai, RJ! Spingilo, RJ! Andiamo!

-[coach] Go! -[Demel] Stay there.
Go!
Go!
[blows whistle] Nice!
[Shon] Let's go! Way to break from it, fellas.
[Puma] I need it louder than that, bro!
-How you feel? -[players] You know!
Clap it up for y'all selves, man. Good work, man. Aight?
translation.it: Fatevi un applauso. Bel lavoro. Ok?

translation.en: If we play well this season,
we get a chance to go to Florida and play for the national championship.
translation.it: potremo andare in Florida e giocare per il campionato nazionale.

translation.en: -Who wants to go to Florida? -[players] Me!
translation.it: - Chi vuole andare in Florida? - Io!

translation.it: Prima dovete giocare bene nelle amichevoli in Long Island.

Time to get ready, understand?
-Yes, coach! -All right!

-[Vick] Down, up! -[players] Two! Three!
-[Demel] There it is. -Shake it off!
Go ahead, bro. Use them legs. Run! You fast!

[Vick] Come in front, D-Lo.
Say, "I don't accept punishment, I give it."
[players] I don't accept punishment, I give it.
-[boy] Ready? Let's go. -[Vick] D-Lo, be a leader.

translation.it: Dovete lavorare di più. Manca poco, ormai.

translation.en: You guys got to get in better shape.
Encourage each other.
Hello? Hello?

-Break down! -[players yell]
[coach] Hustle. Let's go!
[Shon] Go.
It is his responsibility to get you the ball.
translation.it: È sua responsabilità darti la palla.

translation.en: There you go.

translation.it: Sono cresciuto per la settimana infernale. Vivo all'inferno da quando avevo tre anni.

translation.it: Venite sabato prossimo, andiamo in guerra.

translation.en: -Do you understand me? -[players] Yes, coach.

translation.it: Dobbiamo giocare, quindi dobbiamo fare una dichiarazione.

translation.en: -[player yells] -[Demel] Oh, goodness. Fumble, fumble!
-[player] Fumble! Oh! -[Gawuala] Come here!
Get this out. Get a minute. Right now, take a minute.
[boy] Aiden, you alright?
[Gawuala] It's evenly matched. Tell your brother, "Sorry."
translation.it: - Siete pari. - Di' a tuo fratello che ti dispiace.

translation.en: Get him some water.
-You all right? -Nah, I'm good.
[Gawuala] Give him three. Let's go. It's all right, Aiden.
translation.it: Dagli il tre. Andiamo. Va tutto bene, Aiden, nel football capita. Tutto a posto.

translation.en: It's football, this happens. You all right.
translation.it: Va tutto bene, Aiden, nel football capita. Tutto a posto.

translation.en: He ain't mean to hurt you. Believe me, he didn't.
[Aiden] He did it on accident.
I'm telling y'all the truth. I was afraid to get back in.
translation.it: Vi dico la verità. Avevo paura di rientrare.

translation.en: But I've played with them for six years.
translation.it: Ma gioco con loro da sei anni.

translation.en: If I don't trust them,
translation.it: Se non mi fido di loro,

translation.en: why am I here and what I'm doing here for?
Shake it off. It's all right. It happens, all right?
translation.it: Non ci pensare. Va tutto bene. Succede, ok?

translation.en: -It's my breathing… [whines] -All right. Just relax. Take this off.
translation.it: È il mio respiro… Ok, rilassati. Togliti questo.

translation.en: Relax, relax. You excited right now. Just relax, let him breathe.
-[Dave] Drop your shoulder. -Come on.
Look. Put your hands up. Let's go through our nose…
translation.it: Guarda. Alza le mani. Inspira dal naso…

translation.en: [breathes deeply] Out through our mouth. In through our nose. Get your breathing together. It's a learning lesson.
translation.it: ed espira dalla bocca. Dentro… Ti facciamo respirare. È una lezione.

translation.en: Next time, drop your shoulder first. Lowest man wins the battle.
translation.it: Devi abbassare la spalla per primo. Il più basso vince.

translation.en: You know that. You've been with me for four years.
translation.it: Lo sai. Sei con me da quattro anni.

translation.en: I love you, baby boy!
[Aiden] I know I could do better, but I don't find it yet in me.
translation.it: So che potrei fare di meglio, ma non ce la faccio ancora.

translation.en: Coach Gawuala, he took me under his wing
translation.it: Il coach Gawuala mi ha preso sotto la sua ala

translation.en: and now I'm just playing football for a living.
translation.it: e ora gioco a football per vivere.

translation.en: That's what I'm trying to do.
translation.it: È quello che cerco di fare.

translation.en: -[Dave] Quick question. You making dinner? -[woman on phone] Yes.
translation.it: Domanda veloce. Prepari la cena? Sì.

translation.en: [Dave] All right. We'll be here in about… It says 52 minutes.
translation.it: Va bene. Saremo lì tra… dice 52 minuti.

translation.en: [woman] All right.
[Dave] We only sleep upstate.
We still live in Brooklyn.
[Aiden] Some days, we just take showers and go to sleep.
translation.it: Certi giorni, facciamo la doccia e andiamo a dormire.

translation.en: Yup. And then wake up right the next morning.
translation.it: E la mattina dopo mi sveglio presto.

translation.en: [Aiden] Yup. Not even the morning, in the night.
translation.it: Sì. Nemmeno la mattina, di notte.

translation.en: Oh, it's the morning, bro.
-[Aiden] 4:30 is the morning? -Yes.
On a practice day, practice is over at 8:00.
translation.it: In un giorno di allenamento, l'allenamento finisce alle 20.

translation.en: Driving everybody home,
and peoples who don't have rides that we have to give them rides,
translation.it: c'è chi non ha come tornare e dobbiamo dargli un passaggio.

translation.en: I figure we leave Brooklyn at 9:00, get there about 10:30, 11:00-ish.
translation.it: Credo che lasciamo Brooklyn alle 21, arriviamo a casa alle 22,30 - 23.

translation.en: And then we're up every morning at 4:30.
translation.it: E ci svegliamo ogni mattina alle 4:30.

translation.en: -[Aiden] Yeah. -Rolled-eyes emoji.
translation.it: Emoji con gli occhi al cielo.

translation.en: [Dave] It's a lot slower once you get up there and a lot peaceful.
translation.it: Lassù il ritmo è più lento e c'è molta più pace.

translation.en: [Aiden] Upstate is like my vacation.
translation.it: Fuori città è la mia vacanza.

translation.en: And Brooklyn is just all business, about football and school.
translation.it: A Brooklyn è solo lavoro, football e scuola.

translation.en: [Dave] Hey, lady.
So, let me ask you a question. How everybody gets a "hi"
translation.it: Di' un po': com'è che dici "ciao" a tutti

translation.en: when they walk in,
but you don't say nothing to me?
translation.it: ma a me non dici niente?

translation.en: [son] Hey, sir.
-It's me for TV. -All right, stop.
translation.it: - Sono io in TV. - Ok, basta.

translation.en: [Dave] Is this what you been doing all day? Yeah… well, not all day.
translation.it: - Non hai fatto altro tutto il giorno? - Non tutto il giorno.

translation.en: Grandma was on in the morning like always.
translation.it: Al mattino lo usa la nonna.

translation.en: -You blaming Grandma? -I'm not--
translation.it: Dai la colpa alla nonna? Non scaricare tutto su di lei.

translation.en: -Don't throw Grandma under that bus. -All right.
translation.it: Dai la colpa alla nonna? Non scaricare tutto su di lei. Va bene.

translation.en: -[Grandma] You good? -Yeah.
Okay.
[Dave] They love it up here.
And they don't mind me driving.
translation.it: E non gli importa che guidi.

translation.en: Grandma…
that's my rock.
She helps out a lot.
I grew up without a father.
So…
you kind of wing it as you go.
And what mistakes I've made with the oldest, I fixed with the youngest.
translation.it: E gli errori che ho commesso con il grande li ho evitati con il piccolo.

translation.en: Brooklyn Saints is a second job.
translation.it: I Brooklyn Saints sono un secondo lavoro.

translation.en: A non-paying, volunteer, non-profit second job.
translation.it: Un secondo lavoro di volontariato, gratis e senza scopo di lucro.

translation.en: I've got 61 boys that I got to take care of.
translation.it: Ho 61 ragazzi di cui devo occuparmi.

translation.en: Plus, coaches and staff.
translation.it: Più gli allenatori e il personale.

translation.en: You know, these boys deserve the best.
So…
Men do wonderful things when they put their heart first.
translation.it: Gli uomini fanno cose meravigliose quando seguono il cuore.

translation.en: -It's time to get up. -[Aiden sighs]
-Here, bud. -See you later, sir.
-[Aiden] Why you always do that, Dad? -Do what?
translation.it: - Perché lo fai sempre, papà? - Fare cosa?

translation.en: Put your hands on your face.
So I get 13 seconds of sleep.
[Dave] There's a lot of opportunities for my boys down here
translation.it: Ci sono molte più opportunità per i miei ragazzi qui che lassù,

translation.en: than it is up there, as far as football.
translation.it: Ci sono molte più opportunità per i miei ragazzi qui che lassù, nel football.

translation.en: So…
it's my routine every day.
translation.it: è la mia routine di ogni giorno.

so I saw houses like these, but not a lot of them.

Huh. The neighborhoods over here are way different from where we at.

translation.en: Their football programs are sponsored by their communities,
translation.it: I programmi di football sono sostenuti dalle comunità,

translation.en: by the Nassau Police Department, by some police department.
translation.it: dalla polizia di Nassau o di altri posti.

translation.en: Our growth comes from our parents,
to where it's harder for us to get funding in inner-city stuff for our kids
translation.it: perché è difficile ottenere fondi cittadini per i nostri ragazzi

translation.en: because where we are coming from, in Brooklyn.
We actually had a team forfeit because they didn't want to come to Brooklyn.
translation.it: Una squadra si è persino rifiutata di venire a Brooklyn.

translation.en: So, that's the demographic.
It's hard to get teams to come to Brooklyn to play. It's very hard. The location-- -[players cheering and yelling]

Let's go, let's go, let's go!

because we usually don't play on fields like this, you know?

They feel like they're out of the state somewhere,

translation.it: Quindi, se arriviamo in Florida, questo è quello che vedranno

They're gonna know how to act and, uh, perform.

translation.it: Vai al tuo split. Fanno solo degli slap.

translation.en: -Who is not blocking? -You gotta go forward, Tyrel.
translation.it: - Chi sta bloccando? - Vai avanti, Tyrel.

translation.en: You gotta hold your man!
You're not blocking, play shotgun.
translation.it: Non stai bloccando, fai uno shotgun.

translation.en: [coach] Go, Kenan, go! Go, Kenan.
[coach] Let's go, Kenan! Let's go, Kenan!
[9U players] Let's go, Kenan! Let's go, Kenan!
[coach] Stop this crying. What did I told you about that anger?
translation.it: Basta piangere. Che ti ho detto della rabbia?

translation.en: You don't let them tears fall. You inflict that pain on somebody else.
translation.it: Trattieni le lacrime. Infliggi quel dolore a qualcun altro.

translation.en: Where is the testosterone in the house? Why does everybody cry?
translation.it: Dov'è il testosterone? Perché piangono tutti?

translation.en: Everybody cries.
[Gawuala] It's 2019.
What? [Gawuala] It's 2019.
Oh, my God. Oh!
[Gawuala] They sensitive.
I need a Tylenol or a Motrin or something.
translation.it: Mi serve un Tylenol o un Motrin.

translation.en: [Kenan] Huddle! Laser.
If we get a touchdown on the play, we won the game.
-[coach] Let's go! -[Kenan] Go!
Let's go, let's go!
Let's go! Rack it up! Yes, yes!
-[coach] That's how you play the best… -[Dede] Six, zip!
translation.it: - È così che devi giocare. - Sei a zero!

translation.en: -That's right! -[woman] We got this!
We do'ed it! Oh!
[coach] Keep your head up, young man. Y'all balled out.
translation.it: Tieni alta la testa, ragazzo. Siete stati grandi. Testa alta! Alla grande!

translation.en: Keep your head up, fellas. Way to ball! Keep y'all heads up. Way to ball!
translation.it: Siete stati grandi. Testa alta! Alla grande!

translation.en: I got something to say.
We got two weeks of practice before our next game.
translation.it: Abbiamo due settimane prima della prossima partita.

translation.en: -I need everybody at practice. -Yes, sir.
-All right? -[all] Yes, captain.
I don't care if y'all come late. I need you at practice, all right?
translation.it: Non fa niente se fate tardi. Venite all'allenamento, ok?

translation.en: -[all] Yes, captain. -All right?
-All right, bring it in. One, two, three! -[all] Hard work!
[Gawuala] …energy for game time. B-Rock, I'll see you later.
[boy 1] Look, another balloon! It's going to China?
translation.it: Guarda, un palloncino. Sta andando in Cina?

translation.en: [boy 2] Yes, the balloon's going to China.
If you knew how to catch better, it would've been two-nothing.
translation.it: Se avessi saputo ricevere meglio, non…

translation.en: -[Dave] We're going to the Poconos. -[boy] To the Poconos?
translation.it: Andiamo a Poconos. - A Poconos? - A Poconos.

translation.en: -That's the Poconos, isn't it? -[boy] We're going to PA, right?
translation.it: - A Poconos? - A Poconos. - Andiamo in Pennsylvania? - Sì. A Poconos, vero?

translation.en: [Dave] It's the Poconos, right?
translation.it: - Andiamo in Pennsylvania? - Sì. A Poconos, vero?

translation.en: [Dave] Coach Moe and Coach Gawuala does a lot for their kids. Not just football.
translation.it: I coach Mo e Gawuala fanno molto per i ragazzi. Non solo il football.

translation.en: -Y'all ready to have some fun up there? -[boy 1] Yes.
Coach Gawuala, is the place actually haunted?
translation.it: Coach Gawuala, il posto è davvero stregato?

translation.en: I don't know. We gonna figure it out tonight.
translation.it: Non lo so. Lo scopriremo stasera.

translation.en: [Dave] Coming from the city,
and only seeing bricks and pavement, and…
translation.it: dove si vedono solo mattoni e marciapiedi…

translation.en: You know, it takes a lot to sleep outside in the wild,
translation.it: non è facile dormire nella natura,

translation.en: when this is where you come from.
[Gawuala] Now, hold it right there.
It's gonna stand right now, Miguel. Trust this, watch this.
translation.it: Ora starà in piedi, Miguel. Fidati, guarda.

translation.en: Hold that, A.
-As a matter of fact, hold this. -I can hold it now.
Right there.
-[Gawuala] Okay, see what I just did? -Uh-huh.
-[boy] Hey, yo, Coach. -Yes, sir?
The ridges isn't connected to one of them.
translation.it: Uno non è collegato ai crinali.

translation.en: [Gawuala] Give me one second.
[Vick] D-Lo. -What? -Put it through the hole, man.
-Two, three, four, five, six. -Three, four, five, six.
[Vick] You wanna eat? Grab a rock. Help him carry that rock.
translation.it: Vuoi mangiare? Prendi un sasso. Aiutalo a portare il sasso.

translation.en: Okay…
[boy 1] Coach Gawuala…
Do you know the WiFi password?
[Gawuala] There's no such thing as WiFi in the woods.
-[boy 1] Oh! -[Gawuala] You are out of the city.
You are living the "wilderless" life.
There's no cable, no WiFi, no internet,
translation.it: Non ci sono cavi, Wi-Fi, Internet,

translation.en: no Facebook, no Snapchat, no nothing.
You know how you communicate?
-[boy 2] He got YouTube. -See how we're talking?
-That's called communication. -I know.
That's how you communicate amongst your brothers.
translation.it: È così che si comunica tra fratelli.

translation.en: -What if we're separated? -Listen. Shh! This is why we're camping.
translation.it: - Ma se fossimo separati? - Ascolta. Per questo campeggiamo.

translation.en: So we can get a bond and we can be brothers.
translation.it: Per creare un legame, essere fratelli,

translation.en: -We can communicate better. -[boy 3] Is there any water?
So when it comes game time… Give me a second.
Comes game time, and coach relays a message to Miguel
translation.it: Quando giochiamo e il coach trasmette un messaggio a Miguel

translation.en: and Miguel relays it to the rest of the team,
translation.it: e Miguel lo trasmette alla squadra,

translation.en: our "communication" is up to par and we know what we got to do,
translation.it: la nostra comunicazione è buona e sappiamo cosa fare… come una squadra. È chiaro?

translation.en: -as one team. Is that understood? -[all] Yes, coach.
translation.it: e sappiamo cosa fare… come una squadra. È chiaro? Sì, Coach.

translation.en: -[Aiden] How many packs you had? -[boy] What?
translation.it: Quanti pacchi hai? - Cosa? - Quanti pacchi di patatine hai?

translation.en: -How many packs of chips you had? -Two.
translation.it: - Cosa? - Quanti pacchi di patatine hai? - Due. - Due? Possiamo averne solo uno.

translation.en: Two? We're only supposed to get one.
translation.it: - Due. - Due? Possiamo averne solo uno.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Yeah, I only had one.
-[Kodak] Give me my phone back. -[boy] Oh, good. It's that one again.
translation.it: Dammi il cellulare! Oh, bene. È sempre il solito.

translation.en: [Gawuala] Kodak!
I do not care what's the circumstance.
You do not touch nobody's child out here.
translation.it: Non tocchi il figlio di nessuno.

translation.en: -Do you got me? -Yes.
You wanna put your hands on somebody, you go pick up a brick and throw it at a tree.
translation.it: Se ti vuoi sfogare, prendi un mattone e lo lanci contro un albero.

translation.en: I wasn't gonna touch him.
It's just that he took my phone and I was trying to get it back.
translation.it: Mi ha preso il telefono e cercavo di riprendermelo.

translation.en: Okay, come to Coach Gawuala. Let Coach Gawuala deal with it. Got it?
translation.it: Ok, vieni dal coach Gawuala e lasci che ci pensi io. Capito?

translation.en: Anything you need, if you feel opposite, you feel like you gotta scream,
translation.it: Se ti serve qualcosa, se sei contrariato, se hai bisogno di urlare,

translation.en: you come to Coach Gawuala first.
If we have to scream together, we'll do it together,
translation.it: Se dobbiamo urlare insieme, lo faremo,

translation.en: -is that understood? -Yes, coach.
Give me my three.
Easy. I love you.
Go help your brothers out.
-[boy] Thank you. -[coach] Okay.
[Gawuala] How many guys is having fun? Raise your hand.
translation.it: Chi si diverte? Su la mano.

translation.en: We brought you guys camping for the simple fact y'all played a wonderful game.
translation.it: Vi abbiamo portato in campeggio perché avete fatto una grande partita.

translation.en: Y'all starting to understand football. Y'all starting to have fun in football.
translation.it: Cominciate a capire il football, a divertirvi con il football.

translation.en: So we decided to bring you guys camping to enjoy the time out here.
translation.it: Abbiamo deciso di portarvi in campeggio per godervi del tempo all'aperto.

translation.en: How many guys heard cop cars driving past just now?
translation.it: Avete sentito passare le auto della polizia?

translation.en: You heard a cop car drove past here?
translation.it: Hai sentito un'auto della polizia qui?

translation.en: -[boy 1] Mm-mmm. -[boy 2] No.
-[Aiden] Did you say a cop car? -That's the difference.
translation.it: - Hai detto un'auto? - Ecco la differenza.

translation.en: How many guys seen police drive past here or heard an ambulance drive through here?
translation.it: Avete visto un'auto della polizia o sentito arrivare un'ambulanza?

translation.en: Nobody, right? This is why we do this.
translation.it: No, giusto? Ecco perché facciamo questo.

translation.en: So we can take you out of your everyday environment.
translation.it: Per portarvi fuori dal vostro ambiente quotidiano.

translation.en: How many of you guys feel free right now? Raise your hand.
translation.it: Quanti di voi si sentono liberi ora? Su le mani.

translation.en: Good. That's telling me
nobody's thinking about anything back home that they shouldn't be thinking about.
translation.it: che nessuno pensa a niente di quello che c'è a casa a cui non dovrebbe pensare.

translation.en: I don't coach football for wins and losses.
translation.it: Non vi alleno per vincere e perdere.

translation.en: I coach football to teach you young guys how to be young men,
translation.it: Lo faccio per insegnarvi a essere dei giovani uomini,

translation.en: and when you become your own men,
how to be a stronger man and stand tall on your own two feet.
translation.it: a essere forti ed ergervi saldi sulle vostre gambe.

translation.en: I love you guys like you're my own child.
translation.it: Vi amo come se foste miei figli.

translation.en: [boy 1] Love you, too.
[boy 2] Love you, too.
[Gawuala] Y'all know my big motto. Who love you?
translation.it: Conoscete il mio motto. Chi vi ama?

translation.en: -[all] You! Coach Gawuala. -Who love me?
-[all] Me. Us. -Who love you?
-[all] Coach Gawuala. -Who love me?
[all] Us.
[Gawuala] Good job, guys.
Y'all can go have fun.
[Gawuala] Every year starts a new Cinderella story.
translation.it: Ogni anno inizia una nuova storia di Cenerentola.

translation.en: The Cinderella story never stays the same. There's just a new one every year.
translation.it: Non è mai la stessa. Ce n'è una nuova ogni anno.

translation.en: It's always beautiful. It's always beautiful.
[Vick] That desire to have that championship,
translation.it: La voglia di vincere il campionato,

translation.en: to be on that stage and say you're a national champion.
translation.it: di stare sul palco e dire che sei il campione nazionale.

translation.en: It's a chase every year.
[coach] Everybody goes through trials and tribulations,
translation.it: Ognuno deve affrontare le proprie prove e tribolazioni,

translation.en: everybody has to experience things different.
translation.it: vivere le cose in modo diverso.

translation.en: Keeping them off the street, focused at school, disciplined in the home,
translation.it: Tenerli lontani dalla strada, concentrati a scuola, disciplinati in casa,

translation.en: will ensure that they become positive men as they get older.
translation.it: li farà diventare degli uomini perbene.

translation.en: And that's our goal.
It's time to go to work, gentlemen. -Let's go. -[boy] Don't be offside.
translation.it: È ora di andare al lavoro. Andiamo.

translation.en: [Aiden] The game's not all about strength and speed and all of that.
translation.it: Il gioco non è solo forza, velocità e tutto il resto.

translation.en: Probably like 5% of each.
It's all about being wise,
and connecting with all of your teammates.
translation.it: e di entrare in sintonia con tutti i compagni.

translation.en: It's like the coaches.
They see what you can do,
but yourself, you don't know what you can do.
translation.it: ma tu non sai cosa puoi fare.

translation.en: [players] Eleven, twelve, thirteen…
[D-Lo] When Coach Gawuala said that this is your year, I was like,
translation.it: Quando il coach Gawuala ha detto che questo è il mio anno, ho pensato:

translation.en: "This really is my year. I can shine."
translation.it: "È davvero il mio anno. Posso brillare.

translation.en: "I'm just out here doing my thing. Do what I have to do."
translation.it: Devo solo fare il mio lavoro. Fare quello che devo".

translation.en: It's gonna be exciting. It's gonna be something never seen before.
translation.it: Sarà entusiasmante. Sarà una cosa mai vista prima.

translation.en: -[Gawuala] Who the show? -[all] We the show!
translation.it: - Chi è lo spettacolo? - Siamo noi.

translation.en: -Am I my brother's keeper? -[all] You already know! -Am I my brother's keeper? -[all] You already know!
translation.it: - Chi mi guarda le spalle? - La finestra!

translation.en: Number one rule today is to have fun. Is that understood?
translation.it: La regola numero uno è divertirsi. Chiaro?

translation.en: [all] Yes, coach! All I wanna do is have fun.
translation.it: Non m'importa cosa succede. Voglio solo divertirmi. Chiaro?

translation.en: -Is that understood? -Yes, coach!
translation.it: Non m'importa cosa succede. Voglio solo divertirmi. Chiaro? Sì, coach!

translation.en: -Rule number one is to do what? -Have fun! -To do what? -Have fun!
translation.it: - La regola numero uno è fare cosa? - Divertirci!

translation.en: I love every last one of you guys.
[cheerleaders] Let's go, Brooklyn, let's go!
[Gawuala] This one's gonna be epic.
I put my life on the line for this one.
-[whistle blows] -[D-Lo] Go!
Ready… go!
